problemSetting
======================================

.. automodule:: problemSetting
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

   Direction of Progress: questionNumInput.py --> problemSetting.py, descriptiveGradingUI.py --> totalResult.py

   - Receive and store metadata such as scores, marking locations, and problem types of each question in the test
   - Using the data collected so far, proceed with grading
   - Subsequent results are sorted and then moved to the totalResult section

   .. automodule:: problemSetting.problemSetting
      :members:
